targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfMinute(Timestamp) as time, count() as frames FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'store_frame' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE GROUP BY time ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT quantile(0.95)(Duration / 1000000) as p95_ms FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'redis_publish' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE

SELECT uniq(mapValues(ResourceAttributes)[indexOf(mapKeys(ResourceAttributes), 'service.name')]) as active_services FROM otel_traces WHERE Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE AND mapValues(ResourceAttributes)[indexOf(mapKeys(ResourceAttributes), 'service.name')] != ''
SELECT count() as errors FROM otel_traces WHERE StatusCode = 2 AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE
SELECT avg(toFloat64(SpanAttributes['encoded.size_bytes'])) / 1024 as avg_kb FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'encode_frame' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE
SELECT avg(toFloat64(SpanAttributes['redis.buffer_size'])) as avg_buffer FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'redis_publish' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE
SELECT toStartOfMinute(Timestamp) as time, count() as frames_per_minute FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'store_frame' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfMinute(Timestamp) as time, quantile(0.50)(Duration / 1000000) as p50_ms, quantile(0.95)(Duration / 1000000) as p95_ms FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'redis_publish' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfMinute(Timestamp) as time, quantile(0.50)(Duration / 1000000) as encode_p50_ms, quantile(0.95)(Duration / 1000000) as encode_p95_ms FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'encode_frame' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT mapValues(ResourceAttributes)[indexOf(mapKeys(ResourceAttributes), 'service.name')] as Service, count() as Traces, quantile(0.95)(Duration / 1000000) as P95_Duration_ms, max(Timestamp) as Last_Activity FROM otel_traces WHERE Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND mapValues(ResourceAttributes)[indexOf(mapKeys(ResourceAttributes), 'service.name')] != '' GROUP BY Service ORDER BY Traces DESC
SELECT toFloat64(SpanAttributes['encoded.size_bytes']) as frame_size FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'encode_frame' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE

SELECT SpanAttributes['frame.width'] as Width, SpanAttributes['frame.height'] as Height, SpanAttributes['frame.channels'] as Channels, count() as Count FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'store_frame' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE GROUP BY Width, Height, Channels ORDER BY Count DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN error_rate < 0.01 AND avg_latency < 50 AND frame_rate > 10 THEN 100 WHEN error_rate < 0.05 AND avg_latency < 100 AND frame_rate > 5 THEN 75 WHEN error_rate < 0.1 AND avg_latency < 200 AND frame_rate > 1 THEN 50 ELSE 25 END as health_score FROM (SELECT count(*) as total_ops, countIf(StatusCode = 2) / count(*) as error_rate, avg(Duration / 1000000) as avg_latency, countIf(SpanName = 'store_frame') / 5 as frame_rate FROM otel_traces WHERE Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)
SELECT Timestamp, SpanName, StatusMessage FROM otel_traces WHERE StatusCode = 2 AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR ORDER BY Timestamp DESC LIMIT 50
